title: Hackathon Voting for the DAO
body:
# Vot on your favorite Hackathon Submission
![](https://i.ibb.co/vk9mdqj/53024314-m-1000x458.jpg)
With our first year under our belt, I'm thinking that it's time to attract "fresh blood" into the DAO. 

I'd like to create a marketing campaign centered around two things:

* Bringing new people into the DAO
* Highlighting how people can use the DAO for funding their endeavors within the Effect Network

This is purely sentiment gathering. If this passes with a "Yes", I'll devote time, energy, and reasearch and create a marketing plan to present to the DAO.
author: Effect.Network
